ComicInfo.Title: Hyperbreed Part 4: Luck's Playthings
ComicInfo.Series: John Carpenter Presents Storm Kids: Hyperbreed
ComicInfo.Summary: Things are starting to look up! Byrr, Fext, Cammo and Boomer reach their freighter. Yik Void begins to clear it of its crystal infestation. Then Mak pirates return, led by their monstrous captain, Eye-5. Did Boomer betray them to the Maks? Or is there more to the story? Dead splices tell no tales.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 18:47:53. [CVDB779528] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 10:26:43. [Issue ID 2567143]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Guy Dorian Sr.,Guy Dorian,Guy Dorian Sr.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Young Adult, Suggested Ages 12 and Older
